name: Sentry JavaScript SDK Development
install: curl https://get.volta.sh | bash && export VOLTA_HOME="$HOME/.volta" && export PATH="$VOLTA_HOME/bin:$PATH" && export VOLTA_FEATURE_PNPM=1 && yarn install
start: export VOLTA_HOME="$HOME/.volta" && export PATH="$VOLTA_HOME/bin:$PATH" && export VOLTA_FEATURE_PNPM=1

terminals.name: Development
terminals.command: export VOLTA_HOME="$HOME/.volta" && export PATH="$VOLTA_HOME/bin:$PATH" && export VOLTA_FEATURE_PNPM=1 && echo 'Volta setup complete. Node version:' && node --version && echo 'Yarn version:' && yarn --version
terminals.description: Main development terminal with Volta environment configured
